ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes, if you have already done research you want to turn into an article.
I would recommend the course. The course is designed to strengthen writing techniques and apply them to our own work with an eye towards producing an article for publication.

This course teaches you how to produce professional writing. I would definitely recommend this course to another student. It demystifies much of the process of writing and publishing, both of which are integral to academia.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: The course provides an opportunity to work on writing articles which is essential and not covered to this extent in other courses.
Please see above. In short, it has taught me how to write professionally.
